Key Arguments: Freedom of speech is a fundamental right that should not be restrained by the government.
Censorship of opposing voices and political discourse undermines democracy.
Government monitoring of speech is an authoritarian overreach.
Fact-checking standards set by the government can create distrust between the government and its citizens.
Notable Quotes: My freedom of speech if extremely important to me. I will not lay down my god given rights.
Any censorship of speech (be it digital censorship or any other form) will demote the concept of democracy.
Monitoring of citizens speech is an overstep of authoritarian power.
